name: Haythserv-2
body:
# HaythServ-2
## Fast - Powerful - Lightweight

HaythServ-2 is designed to be fast and powerful, but also to be able to run on very weak machines. I remade the original HaythServ, without basing this new mod on anything else, it's written in pure C++, and that makes it be more powerful, because what you can't do in Lua (Lua was used in HaythServ very much), you can do that in C++. There's still a lot to do and this mod is under deep development.

## Current features

* Root privilege level, to share common admin privileges with friends, but keeping highest privileges for yourself.
* No clear bots command to disable (or enable again) the bots clearing at the end of the game.
* Exec player command to run a Cube Script command.
* Text, edit, name, team-change and "full" mute.
* Hidden privileges, master password.
* Permament bans system.
* C++ Player commands.
* Accounting system.
* Teams persisting.
* Flagruns system.
* Rename command.
* Sendto command.
* Stats command. 
* Anti-cheat.

## Task list

There's still a lot to do in HaythServ-2, here's a small list of main-features which I'm gonna add soon:

* Add a whois player-command.

Other features that I'm gonna add somewhen:

* Add external C++ modules.
* Support to re-/un-/load modules without any restart.
* IRC-Bot.
* Total player statistics.
* Add a cw player-command.
* Name mute 

## Download

You can download HaythServ-2 [here](http://162.220.10.113/wiki/index.php?title=Download). You can also just git clone the HaythServ/HaythServ-2 repository...

## Wiki

As promised, I added a wiki where you can see how to install / configure HaythServ-2 and much more things about it. [Click here to visit the official HaythServ-2 wiki!](http://162.220.10.113/wiki/)
